<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Star Foundation ">53a681af4792a11026847688c26d4396</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Attachment for Star</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
   if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
      return;
   }
    try{
    var c= g_form.getValue('purpose_of_join');
   if(c == "summer"){
    g_form.disableAttachments();
}
    }
    catch(e){
        alert("issues with code")
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>akanksha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-25 11:07:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3b1e0d2b47d2a11026847688c26d43a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attachment for Star</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="My custom App" source="x_698230_my_custom">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My custom App">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3b1e0d2b47d2a11026847688c26d43a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>akanksha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-25 12:01:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
